Name: Tort-Seal
LongDescription: Slightly boosts Attack and Special Attack. Keep it in the Treasure Bag to give its benefit to all of these team members: Turtwig, Grotle, and Torterra.  Swap a Tort-Claw and a Tort-Horn for a Tort-Seal at the Croagunk Swap Shop.  See what happens if you collect all three of these items!
